terms.title: Terms of Service

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By accessing and using LIFT•PICK, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

section2.title: 2. Use License
section2.content: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of LIFT•PICK for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:
section2.item2: use the materials for any commercial purpose or for any public display
section2.item3: attempt to reverse engineer any software contained on the website
section2.item4: remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials

section3.title: 3. Disclaimer
section3.content: The materials on LIFT•PICK are provided on an 'as is' basis. LIFT•PICK makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.

section4.title: 4. Limitations
section4.content: In no event shall LIFT•PICK or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on LIFT•PICK, even if LIFT•PICK or an authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage.

section5.title: 5. Accuracy of Materials
section5.content: The materials appearing on LIFT•PICK could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. LIFT•PICK does not warrant that any of the materials on its website are accurate, complete, or current.

section6.title: 6. Links
section6.content: LIFT•PICK has not reviewed all of the sites linked to its website and is not responsible for the contents of any such linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by LIFT•PICK of the site.

section7.title: 7. Modifications
section7.content: LIFT•PICK may revise these terms of service for its website at any time without notice. By using this website you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these terms of service.

section8.title: 8. Governing Law
section8.content: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United States and you irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that state or location.

terms.contact: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please

privacy.title: Privacy Policy

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make a purchase, or contact us for support.

section2.title: 2. Personal Information
section2.content: We may collect the following types of personal information:
section2.item1: Name and contact information (email address, phone number)
section2.item3: Payment information (credit card details, billing address)

section3.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
section3.content: We use the information we collect to:
section3.item1: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
section3.item2: Process transactions and send related information
section3.item3: Send technical notices, updates, and support messages
section3.item4: Respond to your comments and questions

section4.title: 4. Information Sharing
section4.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this privacy policy.

section5.title: 5. Data Security
section5.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

section6.title: 6. Cookies and Tracking
section6.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website and analyze usage patterns.

section7.title: 7. Your Rights
section7.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You may also opt out of certain communications from us.

section8.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
section8.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page.

privacy.contact: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please
